inclusion.criterion: men and women with diagnosis of SLE
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: negative pregnancy test for female subjects of child-bearing age and must accept not to attempt to get pregnant during the period of the study
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subject with active disease as defined by SLAM of at least 8
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: SLICC/ACR damage index of less or equal to 15
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject must be on stable does of NSAIDs, prednisone, or antimalarial (chloroquine sulfate or hydroxychloroquine) at least 4 weeks preceding the study
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: subjects can be under other medications as long as condition or treatment will not interfere with the experimental medications and assessments
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: must understand either French or English and can give written informed consent
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: previous history of hypersensitivity or intolerance to methotrexate or folic acid
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: total SLAM of less than 8 or total SLICC/ACR score of more than 15.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: history of medical non-compliance or inability to comply with instructions
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: subject who have received intra-articular or intramuscular corticosteroids in the four weeks prior to study entry.
exclusion.label: not_met
